borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
The bulk, mass, scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in a detrimental loss of outlook, and a very overbearing impact to both adjoining neighbours (nos 2 and 6 Ventnor Gardens) and further harm to no.2 Ventnor Gardens as it would cause overshadowing and a loss of daylight into habitable rooms and the garden. The development is therefore considered to be unneighbourly and contrary to:

  • Paragraph 130(f) of the National Planning Policy Framework  (NPPF) (DLUHC, September 2023)
  • Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);
  • Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)
  • Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)
  • Paragraph 5.3.3 of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)
  • Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)

The bulk, mass, scale and siting  of the proposed first floor rear extension would be disproportionately large dominating the rear elevation of the dwelling. The proposal further fails to respect and reflect the design of the main dwellinghouse, especially in terms of selected materials, incongruous with the character of the dwelling. The  development is therefore considered harmful to the appearance of the dwelling, built form of the terrace and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:

  • Paragraphs 126 and 130 National Planning Policy Framework  (NPPF) (DLUHC, September 2023)
  • Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021)
  • Policy CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)
  • Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)
  • Paragraph 5.3.3 of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)
  • Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037 (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension
